description.lang: This product equips with precision spherical Fresnel lens, to improve the efficiency of energy reception, high sensitivity and to reducefalse alarm rate.
Z-Wave Plus Lifeline, assigned to send unsolicited report of motion detection status, battery level and factory default reset to the associated device as soon while the status is change.
assigned to send Notification report to other device while motion detected.
assigned to send Binary sensor report to other device while motion detected.
assigned to send Basic Set On Command to control other device while the PIR sensor detect motion.
assigned to send Basic Set Off Command to control other device while the PIR sensor detect motion.
assigned to send Basic Set On Command to control other device while the PIR sensor clear motion.
assigned to send Basic Set Off Command to control other device while the PIR sensor clear motion.
